snippet: A new legislative session has given Alabama lawmakers a perfect opportunity to repeal the worst immigration law in the nation. It looks as if they’re blowing it.
abstract: Editorial encourages Alabama lawmakers not to squander an opportunity to repeal their state's year-old immigration law, contending that it is cruel, destructive and embarrassing; notes that the superficial changes currently under consideration would keep intact the law's most pernicious elements.
lead_paragraph: A new legislative session has given Alabama lawmakers a perfect opportunity to repeal the worst immigration law in the nation. It looks as if they’re blowing it.
